description.full: The default item object.
A small metal screw dropped by a defeated mecha.
description.shop: This item is loved by a certain robot and can be traded in for a moderate amount of Zenny.

description.full: A large metal screw dropped by a defeated master.
description.shop: This item is loved by a certain robot and can be traded in for a generous amount of Zenny.

description.full: A small health pellet that restores up to {RECOVERY}% life energy to one robot on the user's side of the field.
A large health capsule that restores up to {RECOVERY}% life energy to one robot on the user's side of the field.
A small ammo pellet that restores up to {RECOVERY}% weapon energy to one robot on the user's side of the field.
A large ammo capsule that restores up to {RECOVERY}% weapon energy to one robot on the user's side of the field.
A small weapon pellet that sharply raises the attack stat of one robot on the user's side of the field.
A large weapon capsule that drastically raises the attack stat of one robot on the user's side of the field.
A small shield pellet that sharply raises the defense stat of one robot on the user's side of the field.
A large shield capsule that drastically raises the defense stat of one robot on the user's side of the field.
A small mobility pellet that sharply raises the speed stat of one robot on the user's side of the field.
A large mobility capsule that drastically raises the speed stat of one robot on the user's side of the field.
A small multi-color pellet that raises the attack, defense, and speed stats of one robot on the user's side of the field.
A large multi-color capsule that sharply raises the attack, defense, and speed stats of one robot on the user's side of the field.
A large health tank that restores 100% life energy to one robot on the user's side of the field.
A backup program that revives one disabled robot on the user's side of the field with {RECOVERY}% life and weapon energy.
A large ammo tank that restores 100% weapon energy to one robot on the user's side of the field.
A strange pinwheel-shaped generator that can restore {RECOVERY}% life and weapon energy to one robot on the user's side of the field, but only if they're currently on the bench.
A mysterious elemental shard that radiates with the Cutter type energy of a defeated support mecha.  Collect four of these items to generate a new core!
A mysterious elemental core that radiates with the Cutter type energy of a defeated robot master.
description.hold: When held, this item grants compatibility with any Cutter type ability as well as power and weapon energy bonuses similar to that of an internal core.

description.full: A mysterious elemental shard that radiates with the Copy type energy of a defeated support mecha.  Collect four of these items to generate a new core!
A mysterious elemental core that radiates with the Copy type energy of a defeated robot master.
A mysterious elemental shard that radiates with the Neutral type energy of a defeated support mecha.  Collect four of these items to generate a new core!
A mysterious elemental core that radiates with the Neutral type energy of a defeated robot master.
A mysterious drive containing some kind of energy upgrade program.  When held by a robot master, this item doubles the user's maximum life energy in battle.
A mysterious drive containing some kind of weapon upgrade program.  When held by a robot master, this item doubles the user's maximum weapon energy in battle.
A mysterious disc containing some kind of attack booster program.  When held by a robot master, this item increases the user's attack stat by one stage at end of each turn in battle.
A mysterious disc containing some kind of defense booster program.  When held by a robot master, this item increases the user's defense stat by one stage at the end of each turn in battle.
A mysterious disc containing some kind of speed booster program.  When held by a robot master, this item increases the user's speed stat by one stage at the end of each turn in battle.

A mysterious disc containing some kind of elemental booster program.  When held by a robot master, this item increases the field multiplier matching the user's core type by up to {RECOVERY2}% at end of each turn in battle.
A mysterious chip containing some kind of stat rerouting algorithm. When held by a robot master, this item diverts two thirds of the user's attack points into other stats while they're in battle.
A mysterious chip containing some kind of stat rerouting algorithm. When held by a robot master, this item diverts two thirds of the user's defense points into other stats while they're in battle.
A mysterious chip containing some kind of stat rerouting algorithm. When held by a robot master, this item diverts two thirds of the user's speed points into other stats while they're in battle.

A mysterious chip that improves the targeting capabilities of the holder.  When held by a robot master, this item allows abilities that typically only reach the front row to target benched robots as well.

A mysterious chip that improves the charging capabilities of the holder.  When held by a robot master, this item allows the user to skip the charging phase of abilities that typically require two turns to execute.
A mysterious chip that protects the holder's stats in battle.  When held by a robot master, this item makes any attempted stat changes to its owner have no effect.
A mysterious chip that regulates the holder's stats in battle.  When held by a robot master, this item makes any stat changes to its owner have an opposite effect.
A mysterious chip that deregulates the holder's stats in battle.  When held by a robot master, this item makes any stat changes to its owner have an extreme effect.
A mysterious chip that improves the holder's experiences in battle.  When held by a robot master, this item doubles experience points and bonus stats earned upon defeating a target.

A mysterious chip that improves the holder's luck in battle.  When held by a robot master, this item greatly increases the amount of zenny earned from missions and causes enemies to drop items more frequently.
A mysterious battery-like circuit that grants the holder an elemental affinity to Electric type damage in exchange for a weakness to Nature type damage.
A mysterious sponge-like circuit that grants the holder an elemental affinity to Water type damage in exchange for a weakness to Electric type damage.
A mysterious forge-like circuit that grants the holder an elemental affinity to Flame type damage in exchange for a weakness to Water type damage.
A mysterious sapling-like circuit that grants the holder an elemental affinity to Nature type damage in exchange for a weakness to Flame type damage.
A mysterious hourglass-themed circuit that grants the holder an elemental affinity to Time type damage in exchange for a weakness to Space type damage.
A mysterious celestial-themed circuit that grants the holder an elemental affinity to Space type damage in exchange for a weakness to Time type damage.

A helpful program developed by Dr. Light for use in the prototype, this item allows the doctors to share their unlocked abilities and items with one another.  This program also unlocks the "Player Battles" bonus chapter in the post-game.

An essential program developed by Dr. Wily for use in the prototype, this item allows the doctors to transfer unlocked robot masters between each other.  This program also unlocks the "Challenge Mode" bonus chapter in the post-game.

An intriguing program developed by Dr. Cossack for use in the prototype, this item allows the doctors to scan for and locate alien energy in the prototype.  This program also unlocks the "Star Fields" bonus chapter in the post-game.
A communication link created by Dr. Light for use inside the prototype, this item grants the doctors contact with Auto and allows access to his shop.
A communication link created by Dr. Wily for use inside the prototype, this item grants the doctors contact with Reggae and allows access to its shop.
A communication link created by Dr. Cossack for use inside the prototype, this item grants the doctors contact with Kalinka and allows access to her shop.
A rare piece of source code acquired by Auto during his journey, these files detail the mechanics of consumable items in the prototype and grant access to the Item Shop.
A rare piece of source code acquired by Auto during his journey, these files detail the mechanics of holdable items in the prototype and grant access to the Parts Shop.
A rare piece of source code acquired by Reggae during its journey, these files detail the mechanics of support abilities in the prototype and grant access to the Ability Shop.
A rare piece of source code acquired by Reggae during its journey, these files detail the mechanics of special weapons in the prototype and grant access to the Weapon Shop.
A rare piece of source code acquired by Kalinka during her journey, these files detail the construction of robot masters in the prototype and grant access to the Robot Shop.
A rare piece of source code acquired by Kalinka during her journey, these files detail the creation of alternate outfits in the prototype and grant access to the Alt Shop.
A small seed-like object of unknown origin, this item appears to reveal and grant control over the hidden Omega influences in the prototype.  It's unknown how one comes to possess such an item.

A mysterious elemental star that radiates with the energy of a distant planet. These stars appear to form on elemental battle fields and come in a variety of different types. Collecting stars increases one's Starforce and makes their robots grow stronger!

A mysterious elemental star that radiates with the energy of distant planets. These stars appear to form when two different battle fields fuse together and come in a variety of different types. Collecting stars increases one's Starforce and makes their robots grow stronger!
A mysterious elemental shard that resonates with the frequency of a corrupted support mecha.  Avoid collecting four of these items or they may generate a new core!
A mysterious elemental core that resonates with the frequency of a corrupted robot master.  Do not engage with this item, as it will only bring despair to those nearby.
A mysterious chip that regulates the holder's stats in battle.  When held by a robot master, this item prevents any and all stat changes from affecting the user.

A mysterious elemental star that radiates with the energy of a distant planet. These stars appear to come in a variety of different types and collecting lots of them may be essential to progressing through the story.  A certain character is also said to be researching these items and would likely trade a respectable amount of Zenny to study one up close.
A mysterious elemental shard that radiates with the Energy type energy of a defeated support mecha.  Collect four of these items to generate a new core!
A mysterious elemental core that radiates with the Life energy of a defeated robot master.
A mysterious elemental shard that radiates with the Attack type energy of a defeated support mecha.  Collect four of these items to generate a new core!
A mysterious elemental core that radiates with the Attack type energy of a defeated robot master.
A mysterious elemental shard that radiates with the Defense type energy of a defeated support mecha.  Collect four of these items to generate a new core!
A mysterious elemental core that radiates with the Defense type energy of a defeated robot master.
A mysterious elemental shard that radiates with the Speed type energy of a defeated support mecha.  Collect four of these items to generate a new core!
A mysterious elemental core that radiates with the Speed type energy of a defeated robot master.

A mysterious elemental star that radiates with the Attack type energy of a distant planet.  These items have no effect in battle, but are loved by a certain character and can be traded in for an impressive amount of Zenny.
